Author: HoltSawye
EnhancedContent: I downloaded the Win11 system from the official website to a USB flash drive, reinstalled the system, deleted the original system disk drive 2 partition, and then repartitioned it. I left 250 GB for the system disk and allocated another 750 GB to another disk. After reinstalling the system using the USB flash drive, I restarted the computer, but it didn't work. I tried several times, but it still didn't work.
